title: Himi 654
lyrics:
M.Kh.
1.
Ko e tau ‘a Laumālie
‘Oku tau mo’ua ai,
Pea fetā’aki ai pē
‘A Sētane mo Sātai
Fai tangane! Fai tangane!
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku kau.
Fai tangane! Fai tangane!
Fai tangane ‘i he tau.
2.
Tongi ia ki hota loto
Ko e tau ta’etuku ē;
Pea ‘oua te ta ‘oho,
Ka ta fa’a ‘ukuma pē.
Fai tangane, etc.
3.
‘Oku kau ai ‘a tangata,
‘Uma’ā ‘a tamasi’i;
Ke na fai pe hona nafa
‘O fekuki mo e Fili.
Fai tangane, etc.
4.
‘Oka luma ho kaume’a;
‘O nau feinga ho afe’i,
Tu’u ‘o ngali Tāniela
He fa’ahi ‘a Lelei.
Fai tangane, etc.
5.
Ko Kakano te ne o’i
Ke ke sio faingofua;
‘Oua te ke lotofo’i,
Piki pē ki he ‘Otua.
Fai tangane, etc.
6.
‘Oka fakatē he fili
‘Ene ngaahi kongakau,
Hanga koe ki he ‘Eiki
Te’eki vaivai ‘i ha tau.
Fai tangane! Fai tangane!
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku kau.
Fai tangane! Fai tangane!
Fai tangane ‘i he tau. *
